welcome_message_body: Welcome to Middle River, known for its charming small-town feel and friendly community. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and immerse yourself in its unique charm. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at BWI Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at BWI Airport serves domestic flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at BWI Airport serves domestic flights for American Airlines, Delta Air Lines, and Spirit Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at BWI Airport serves domestic flights for Alaska Airlines, JetBlue Airways, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at BWI Airport serves domestic and international flights for Air Canada, British Airways, and Condor.

terminals.name: Concourse E
terminals.description: Concourse E at BWI Airport serves domestic and international flights for Aer Lingus, Air France, and Icelandair.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Tipton AAF Airport is exclusively for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
